metadata.subject: Jesuits
Inquisition
metadata.title: Decret de l'inquisition contre l'arrest du parlement. Lettre de Monsieur Paul touchant ledit decret, auec la prophetie de Sorbonne, &c
metadata.creator: Paris (France). Université. Faculté de théologie
metadata.call_number: Case Wing folio Z144 .A1 v. 1 no. 22
metadata.description: Concerns certain books condemned by the Inquisition, in a decree dated 9 Nov. 1609
The letter of Monsieur Paul, juiconsulte, dated Caen, 20 Dec. 1663, directed to the President au Grand Conseil, attributes the actions to the influence of the Jesuits
The letter of the Faculté de théologie, Université de Paris is dated 1 Dec. 1554
metadata.notes: No copyright found. No table of contents found. Damaged, stained pages and cover. Title on cover page.
